with count_der as ( select count(der.id) as total, funcao_transacao_id from der where funcao_transacao_id notnull group by funcao_transacao_id ),count_der_with_one as ( select coalesce(der.valor, 1)as total, t_der.funcao_transacao_id as funcao_transacao_id from count_der t_der inner join der on der.funcao_transacao_id=t_der.funcao_transacao_id where total = 1 ),count_der_more_one as ( select * from count_der where total > 1 ),sum_der as ( select * from count_der_with_one union select * from count_der_more_one ), count_alr as ( select count(alr.id) as total, funcao_transacao_id from alr where funcao_transacao_id notnull group by funcao_transacao_id ), total_alr_with_one as ( select coalesce(alr.valor, 1)as total, t_alr.funcao_transacao_id as funcao_transacao_id from count_alr t_alr inner join alr on alr.funcao_transacao_id=t_alr.funcao_transacao_id where total = 1 ), total_alr_more_one as ( select * from count_alr where total > 1 ),sum_alr as ( select * from total_alr_more_one union select * from total_alr_with_one )
select ft.id ,ft.name ,ft.tipo ,ft.complexidade ,ft.pf ,ft.analise_id ,ft.fator_ajuste_id ,ft.funcionalidade_id ,fa.nome as fatorAjuste ,ft.sustantation ,ft.grosspf ,ft.status_funcao ,ft.ordem ,ft.equipe_id ,te.nome as nome_equipe ,fc.nome as nome_funcionalidade ,md.id as id_modulo ,md.nome as nome_modulo ,case when fa.nome is not null then concat(fa.codigo,' - (', fa.origem,') - ',fa.nome,' - ', round( fa.fator, 2)) else null end as deflator ,coalesce(sum_der.total,0) as total_ders ,coalesce(sum_alr.total,0) as total_alrs from funcao_transacao ft left join funcionalidade fc on ft.funcionalidade_id = fc.id left join tipo_equipe te on ft.equipe_id = te.id left join modulo md on fc.modulo_id = md.id left join fator_ajuste fa on fa.id = ft.fator_ajuste_id left join sum_der on sum_der.funcao_transacao_id = ft.id left join sum_alr on sum_alr.funcao_transacao_id = ft.id;
